com.communote.server.core.mail

Interface MimeMessageSender

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CatchAllSmtpMimeMessageSender, FileSystemMimeMessageSender, SmtpMimeMessageSender

    public interface MimeMessageSender
    Send a mime message.
    Author:
    Communote team - http://communote.github.io/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage createMimeMessage() 
      void send(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message)
      Send the mime message.
      boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
      Test the new configuration for sending mime messages.
      boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings, javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage testMessage)
      Test the new configuration for sending mime messages and send a test message.
      void updateSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
      Update the configuration of this mime message sender so that it will be used in subsequent invocations of send(MimeMessage).

    • Method Detail

      • createMimeMessage

        javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage createMimeMessage()
        Returns:
        an empty mime message to be filled by the caller

      • send

        void send(javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage message)
   throws MailingException
        Send the mime message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to send
        Throws:
        MailingException - in case sending failed

      • testSettings

        boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
        Test the new configuration for sending mime messages. Implementations can for example do a connection test. Exceptions should be caught and logged.
        Parameters:
        settings - the configuration to test
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is valid for this mime message sender implementation, false otherwise.

      • testSettings

        boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings,
                     javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage testMessage)
        Test the new configuration for sending mime messages and send a test message. Exceptions should be caught and logged.
        Parameters:
        settings - the configuration to test
        testMessage - a test message to send. Can be null. In this case the method should behave like testSettings(Map).
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is valid for this mime message sender implementation, false otherwise.

      • updateSettings

        void updateSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
        Update the configuration of this mime message sender so that it will be used in subsequent invocations of send(MimeMessage). Implementations don't need to validate the settings.
        Parameters:
        settings - the new settings
